# Restorative Ointment
## Overview
**Aura** faint conjuration; **CL** 5th

**Slot** â€”

**Price** 4,000 gp

**Weight** 1/2 lb.

**Description**

A jar of this unguent is 3 inches in diameter and 1 inch deep, and contains five applications. Placed upon a poisoned wound or swallowed, the ointment detoxifies any poison (as *[[Neutralize Poison (Spell)|neutralize poison]]* with a +5 bonus on the check). Applied to a diseased area, it removes disease (as *[[Remove Disease (Spell)|remove disease]]* with a +5 bonus on the check). Rubbed on a wound, the ointment cures 1d8+5 points of damage (as *[[Cure Light Wounds (Spell)|cure light wounds]]*).

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Cure Light Wounds (Spell)|cure light wounds]], [[Neutralize Poison (Spell)|neutralize poison]], [[Remove Disease (Spell)|remove disease]]*

**Cost** 2,000 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 529
